about.title: About Me
about.content:
I'm Hansal Bhangale, a Software Engineering student at the University of Mumbai, passionate about the intersection of Data Science, AI, and Financial Modelling. With a strong foundation in both tech and finance—backed by a CFA Level 1 certification—I enjoy solving real-world problems through data-driven, scalable solutions.

I’ve worked on diverse projects from quantum computing and LSTM-based forecasting to financial sentiment analysis and supply chain optimization. My experience includes developing advanced algorithms at CybraneX Technologies, building AI dashboards with Streamlit, and working with technologies like LangChain, OpenAI, and FAISS. I'm always eager to learn, experiment, and create impact through intelligent systems.

projects.title: News Research Tol
projects.description: An AI-powered tool that reads business news articles from various links , combines them and answers financial questions with insightful, evidence-based analysis from the sources.

projects.title: Earnings Call Analysis
projects.description: An intelligent assistant that reads company earnings call transcripts and answers complex financial questions with contextual, structured insights.

projects.title: Predictive Asset Allocation System
projects.description: An intelligent dashboard that predicts a user's financial risk score and recommends a personalized stock portfolio using future price forecasts and risk-based optimization strategies.

projects.title: YouTube Video Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: A web app that transcribes YouTube videos, summarizes the content, and performs sentiment analysis to evaluate financial tone—all through a simple, interactive interface.

projects.title: Movie Recommender
projects.description: This Movie Recommender project uses content-based filtering to suggest similar movies based on user input. It processes movie metadata, extracts features, and computes similarity scores to generate recommendations.

projects.title: Student Marks Prediction
projects.description: This project predicts student marks using an end-to-end data pipeline, covering data ingestion, preprocessing, model training, and evaluation. It automates the entire workflow from raw data to model deployment, ensuring reproducibility and scalability.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.description: An interactive app that predicts the likelihood of a bank customer churning using a trained deep learning model, based on demographic and account activity data.

projects.title: Invoice Extractor
projects.description: A web app that extracts key details from invoice images using Google's Gemini Vision API, allowing users to ask natural language questions like “What is the total amount?” or “Who is the vendor?”

projects.title: House Predcition
projects.description: This project predicts house prices using data analysis, feature engineering, and machine learning

projects.title: Employee Attrition
projects.description: This notebook explores employee attrition data, processes features, and applies machine learning models to predict employee status. It uses Python libraries for data analysis, visualization, and classification.

projects.title: Goolge PlayStore
projects.description: Analyzed app data to identify the most installed category, top 5 apps per leading category, and count of apps with a perfect 5-star rating—highlighting key trends in user engagement and popularity.

achievements.title: CFA LEVEL 1
achievements.description: Successfully cleared CFA Level 1 with a strong score of 1660, demonstrating solid proficiency in financial analysis, ethics, portfolio management, and investment tools. This milestone reflects a strong foundation in core finance concepts and analytical thinking.

achievements.title: SDE Intern
achievements.description: Currently working as a Software Development Intern focused on GenAI backend development, leveraging GCP and Docker to build scalable and efficient systems. Engaged in full-time development from July to December 2025.

achievements.title: BTech (Computer Science)
achievements.description: Pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering with a specialization in Data Science Honors at Mumbai University, gaining strong foundations in AI, ML, and data-driven technologies.

achievements.title: Quantum Developer
achievements.description: I was asigned the role of Quantum Developer where I worked on Supply Chain Optimization. During this I worked on QAOA and VQE algorithms for optimizing the inventory management between suppliers and retailers and path optimization also.I was asigned the role of Quantum Developer where I worked on Supply Chain Optimization. During this I worked on QAOA and VQE algorithms for optimizing the inventory management between suppliers and retailers and path optimization also.

achievements.title: Quantum Researcher
achievements.description: I worked as a Quantum Reaseacher where I was assigned to find and develop Quantum algorithm for Optimizing the Protein Structure
